item.title: Robo Advisors Based on Algorithmic Trading: Returns up to 181.96% in 1 Years
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Robo Advisors

This Brazil Stock forecast was generated by the I Know First Algorithm through its analysis of market data and is part of the By Country Package. The full forecast includes daily predictions for a total of 20 stocks with bullish and bearish signals:

  • Top 10 Brazil stocks for the long position
  • Top 10 Brazil stocks for the short position
Package Name: By Country - Brazilian Stocks
Recommended Positions: Long
Forecast Length: 1 Years (10/25/2015 - 10/25/2016)
I Know First Average: 66.69%
In this 1 Years forecast for the By Country - Brazilian Stocks Package, there were many high performing trades and the algorithm correctly predicted 8 out 10 stocks. The top-performing prediction in this forecast was GOL, which registered a return of 181.96%. Other notable stocks were BBD and CPL with a return of 122.62% and 102.05%. The package had an overall average return of 66.69%, providing investors with a premium of 63.41% over the S&P 500’s return of 3.28% during the same period. ###TOPSTOCKDESCRIPTION### Algorithmic traders utilize these daily forecasts by the I Know First market prediction system as a tool to enhance portfolio performance, verify their own analysis and act on market opportunities faster. This forecast was sent to current I Know First subscribers.

item.title: Most Undervalued Stocks Based on Deep Learning: Returns up to 70.28% in 1 Month
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Most Undervalued Stocks

The Fundamental Package includes our algorithmic forecasts for stocks screened by fundamental criteria. Our algorithms help you find best opportunities for both long and short positions for the stocks within each fundamental screen. The stocks are selected according to four basic valuation categories:

  • P/E (price to earnings ratio)
  • PEG (price/earnings to growth ratio)
  • price-to-book ratio
  • price-to-sales ratio
Package Name: Fundamental - Low price-to-sales ratio Stocks
Recommended Positions: Long
Forecast Length: 1 Month (09/25/2016 - 10/25/2016)
I Know First Average: 18.58%
10 out of 10 stock prices in this forecast for the Fundamental - Low P/E Ratio Stocks Package moved as predicted by the algorithm. MTL was our best stock pick this week a return of 70.28%. GOL and ARCW followed with returns of 26.04% and 22.75% for the 1 Month period. The package saw an overall yield of 18.58% versus the S&P 500’s return of -0.99% implying a market premium of 19.57%. ###TOPSTOCKDESCRIPTION### Algorithmic traders utilize these daily forecasts by the I Know First market prediction system as a tool to enhance portfolio performance, verify their own analysis and act on market opportunities faster. item.title: Using Genetic Algorithms To Forecast Financial Markets Using Genetic Algorithms To Forecast Financial Markets : Returns up to 200.58% in 3 Months
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Using Genetic Algorithms To Forecast Financial Markets Using Genetic Algorithms To Forecast Financial Markets

This forecast is part of the Risk-Conscious Package, as one of I Know First's equity research solutions. We determine our aggressive stock picks by screening our algorithm daily for higher volatility stocks that present greater opportunities but are also riskier. The full Risk-Conscious Package includes a daily forecast for a total of 40 stocks divided into four main categories:

  • Top 10 Aggressive stocks for long position
  • Top 10 Aggressive stocks for short position
  • Top 10 Conservative stocks for long position
  • Top 10 Conservative stocks for short position
Package Name: Risk-Conscious
Recommended Positions: Long
Forecast Length: 3 Months (07/25/2016 - 10/25/2016)
I Know First Average: 29.56%
During the 3 Months forecasted period several picks in the Risk-Conscious Package saw significant returns. The algorithm had correctly predicted 5 out 10 stocks. The prediction with the highest return was CWEI, at 200.58%. Further notable returns came from EXAS and GOL at 56.89% and 53.31%, respectively. The Risk-Conscious package had an overall average return of 29.56%, providing investors with a premium of 31.03% over the S&P 500's return of -1.47%. ###TOPSTOCKDESCRIPTION### Algorithmic traders utilize these daily forecasts by the I Know First market prediction system as a tool to enhance portfolio performance, verify their own analysis and act on market opportunities faster.
